alert.note: Alert for Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 09 at 7:31AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Alabama, including the following county, Mobile. * WHEN...Until 1030 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water over roadways possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 731 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. Between 3 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bayou La Batre, Coden, Dixon Corner, Saint Elmo, Irvington, Fowl River and Laurendine.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
